title: How to Play Quirky Questions on Tomodachi Life

steps.headline: Make at least ten Miis on Tomodachi Life.
steps.description:
You must have ten Miis living on your island to play Quirky Questions. You can make Miis at the town hall. What Miis you make and how you make them (from scratch, from photo or transferred from Mii Maker) doesn't matter as long as you make ten. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/2\/2a\/Tomodachi-Life4.jpeg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/2\/2a\/Tomodachi-Life4.jpeg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"} Babies born from islanders do not count unless they have grown up and are living in an apartment.

steps.headline: Go to the Observation Tower.
steps.description:
The Observation Tower is located on the top right of the map, between the park and interior store. It is represented with an orange icon with a picture of the tower on it. It may have a bubble with a person on it, this just means someone is there. Double tap on the icon on the bottom screen to enter or press the icon once the select Enter. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/f\/f1\/Play-Quirky-Questions-on-Tomodachi-Life.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/f\/f1\/Play-Quirky-Questions-on-Tomodachi-Life.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":276,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":456,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Tap on the orange Event Schedule.
steps.description:
On the top screen it should say "Always on! Quirky Questions". On the bottom screen there should be three options: an arrow to take you back to the map in the bottom left corner; a Close option on the bottom left which closes the Event Schedule without leaving the Observation Tower; the third option is on the top of the screen and says Quirky Questions. Select that option to get started on the game. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/e\/e4\/Play-Quirky-Questions-on-Tomodachi-Life-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/e\/e4\/Play-Quirky-Questions-on-Tomodachi-Life-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":276,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":456,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Select one of the three incomplete questions to add your own input.
steps.description:
You can complete the question however you want and can make it personal. You have a 20 character limit. Press OK when you are done. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/7\/7a\/Play-Quirky-Questions-on-Tomodachi-Life-3.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/7\/7a\/Play-Quirky-Questions-on-Tomodachi-Life-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"} Some words are deemed offensive by the game. If a word is deemed offensive a message saying "This contains inappropriate language and cannot be used." will appear. Press OK and choose something else.

steps.headline: Press Ask.
steps.description:
The person at the front will ask the question and it's up to the other six Miis to answer. They may put their hand up normally, put their hand up, embarrassed, put up their hand and jump up and down eagerly or appear shocked by someone else's response. It is also possible all Miis will close their eyes in disagreement. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/f\/fa\/Play-Quirky-Questions-on-Tomodachi-Life-4.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/f\/fa\/Play-Quirky-Questions-on-Tomodachi-Life-4.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":276,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":456,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"} The Miis' responses are totally random and do not say anything about your Mii's character. For example, if you ask which Mii likes another Mii and a Mii puts their hand up, this is a random response and doesn't necessarily say anything about the Miis' relationship.

steps.headline: Select the Autofill option to automatically fill the questions.
steps.description:
The game will randomly supply you with completed questions. It is likely some of them will make sense whilst others will not. If you are unhappy with any of the options you can press Autofill again to generate three more options. Select one of the options before pressing Ask. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/e\/ee\/Play-Quirky-Questions-on-Tomodachi-Life-5.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/e\/ee\/Play-Quirky-Questions-on-Tomodachi-Life-5.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Press Finish after the third round.
steps.description:
Once you press finish a Mii will say "Thanks for playing!" and you will be taken back to the Observation Tower. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/3\/3e\/Play-Quirky-Questions-on-Tomodachi-Life-6.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/3\/3e\/Play-Quirky-Questions-on-Tomodachi-Life-6.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":276,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":456,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"}
